aboutme1.p: or also known under the nickname "arminmiau". I am {age} years old and from Austria. Computertechnologies, software development and video games are my passion. I create this website to build experience and to have an online portfolio of my skills.

ul_items: networking, database engineering and project management.

aboutme3.p: Back when I joined the voluntary firefighters at an age of 10, it was only because of my old friends, however since when I became an active firefighter (instead of a youth firefighter) my reason to stay has been to be able to help people in need.
ul1_items: Radio/communication and tasks in operational control achievement badge in bronze
Fire service achievement badge in bronze

aboutme4.p1: and I have been planning my own game for a long time.
aboutme4.p2: However, I haven't made any mentionable progress in the development. I want to make a survival craft open world rpg, with a class system inspired by games like World of Warcraft, Guild Wars 2 and New World.
